title: The Champion of the Big Exam: Draw the Protagonist’s Halo at the Beginning - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Accelerated Growth   Early Romance   Male Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   System Administrator   Weak to Strong
author: 欲买桂花同载酒
description:
On the eve of the college entrance examination, Qin Feng accidentally obtained the [Protagonist Halo System].

As long as he performs system tasks, he can infinitely extract protagonist halos with different attributes.

Scholar halo: IQ against the sky, the number one student in the college entrance examination is scheduled!

Kung Fu Halo: Skeleton surprise, martial arts prodigy, proficient in martial arts!

Boyfriend Power Halo: In front of your girlfriend, never get shriveled!

The halo of the genius doctor: the silver needle crosses people, and the medical skills are unparalleled!

Soldier King Halo: The combat power is on the table, and there are 100,000 soldiers behind him!

The halo of overbearing president : worth trillions, and there are mines at home!

The halo of Critical Strike: One punch to fly the international killer, slaughter the Immortal Venerable and the Demon Emperor!

Halo of Immortality: Immortal,Immortal!

Invincible Halo: You’re invincible, you can do whatever you want!

…

After Qin Feng extracted thousands of protagonist’s halos, he found that he had become an invincible existence, and he also dominated countless parallel worlds, and deeply realized how lonely it is to be invincible as the protagonist.>
